name: Mage Staff
description: A magical staff imbued with the power of the arcane.
looks: The Mage Staff is a tall wooden staff with intricate carvings and an orb of glowing energy at the top. It emits a faint magical aura.

special_weapon_skills.elemental_attunement: Allows the wielder to channel and control various elemental energies.

special_effects.spell_power: Increases the power of all spells cast by the wielder.

name: Iron Sword
description: A sturdy iron sword with a sharp blade.
looks: The iron sword has a straight, double-edged blade with a silver tint. The handle is made of leather wrapped around a metal core.

name: Steel Sword
description: A sturdy sword made from steel, suitable for slashing and thrusting attacks.
looks: The steel sword has a straight blade with a single edge and a pointed tip. The hilt is wrapped in leather for a comfortable grip and has a simple crossguard.

name: Silver Sword
description: A finely crafted sword made from pure silver.
looks: The silver sword has a gleaming blade with intricate engravings along its length. The hilt is adorned with a silver grip and a decorative pommel.

special_weapon_skills.sword_mastery: Grants a bonus to sword damage.

name: Steel Sword
description: A sharp and sturdy steel sword.
looks: The steel sword has a straight blade with a single cutting edge. The hilt is wrapped in leather for a comfortable grip, and the pommel is decorated with an intricate design.

special_weapon_skills.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill when used.

name: Steel Greaves
description: Sturdy leg armor made of steel plates
looks: The greaves are made up of overlapping steel plates that cover the front and sides of the legs. They are secured with leather straps and buckles.

name: Steel Sword
description: A sturdy sword made of steel
looks: The steel sword has a long, straight blade with a sharp edge. The hilt is made of leather and metal, providing a comfortable grip.

special_weapon_skills.sword: Increases damage with swords and grants access to sword-related skills

name: Iron Helmet
description: A sturdy iron helmet that provides good protection for the head.
looks: The iron helmet is made of solid iron with a smooth surface. It has a rounded shape with a face guard that covers the lower part of the face. There are small openings for the eyes and a ventilation hole at the top.

name: Steel Sword
description: A razor-sharp sword made of steel
looks: The steel sword has a straight blade with a single cutting edge. The hilt is wrapped in leather for a comfortable grip, and the pommel is adorned with a decorative design.

special_weapon_skils.swordsmanship: Increases damage and accuracy when using this sword.

name: Mystic Staff
description: A magical staff imbued with ancient arcane energy.
looks: The Mystic Staff is a tall wooden staff, carved with intricate designs and topped with a shimmering crystal orb. The wood is dark and polished, and it emanates a faint glow.
